chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem: 
When will my package be shipped?

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

The customer contacts us because his order has not yet been shipped.

Is there a reason for this?

If not, please ship the order within 24 hours, or we will have to initiate a refund.

Thank you in advance for your cooperation

Regards,
Tania from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We're getting ready to ship the parcel and want to ensure everything's perfect. Can we quickly re-confirm the customer's address?

Your satisfaction is our priority, and this small step helps us guarantee a seamless delivery experience. Just a moment of your time could prevent any delivery issues.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
SY

Dear ecomobile, 

the customer's address is the right one. Send the order today or we will refund.

Regards,
Tania from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

The parcel appears to be stolen. We are conducting an internal investigation regarding this matter. In the meantime, we have reimbursed the customer completely for this order. We are deeply sorry for the inconvenience caused.

Regards,
SY
